lines.text: Ted, you know you're always welcome here. Here's what you're going to do. You're going to park your Airstream in my backyard, and you're going to live out of my fridge.

[to Ted, when the dog Thor is reluctant to approach him]
What did you do, spit in his Alpo?

[to Brett, who is sulking because his dog Thor was sent to the pound]
Come here.
There'll be other animals in your life.

[Werewolf Ted has Brett by the throat, Janet points the revolver at Ted]
Get the fuck off my son!

[Said to running Janet, while transforming into a werewolf]
Come back here, you stupid bitch.

[Said when Thor finds him wounded in the forest]
Do it. Finish it.
